metadata.title: CVE-2019-19479 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - low
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in OpenSC through 0.19.0 and 0.20.x through0.20.0-rc3. libopensc/card-setcos.c has an incorrect read operation duringparsing of a SETCOS file attribute.

criterions.comment: opensc: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
